workflow

From configuration to results in minutes. No complex setup required.

Powerful yet
simple syntax

Define complex security workflows in readable YAML

Flow
# workflow.yaml - Osmedeus Workflow Example
kind: flow
name: demo-flow
description: Demo flow orchestrating modules with decision routing
params:
  - name: threads
    default: "5"
  - name: mode
    default: "full"
modules:
  - name: bash-module
    path: sub-module/demo-bash.yaml
    params:
      threads: "{{threads}}"
  - name: docker-module
    path: sub-module/demo-docker.yaml
    depends_on: [bash-module]
    condition: "{{mode}} == 'full'"
    on_success:
      - action: export
        name: scan_status
        value: "complete"
    decision:
      switch: "{{scan_status}}"
      cases:
        "complete": { goto: ssh-module }
      default: { goto: _end }
  - name: ssh-module
    path: sub-module/demo-ssh.yaml
    depends_on: [docker-module]
Osmedeus

Modern orchestration engine for security automation. Build powerful workflows with declarative YAML.
